original_text: You can be sure about this. The master of a house does not know when a man might come to rob him. If he knew the time, he would keep awake. He would not let the robber come into his house and take away his things.
korean_text: 너희도 아는 바니 집 주인이 만일 도둑이 어느 때에 이를 줄 알았더라면 그 집을 뚫지 못하게 하였으리라

sentences.original_text: You can be sure about this.
The master of a house does not know
when a man might come to rob him.
He would not let the robber come
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 도둑이 들어오는 것을 허용하지 않았을 것이고

sentences.original_text: into his house and take away his things.
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 집에 들어와 물건을 가져가지 못했을 것이다.
